description:
As war spreads throughout Lodoss, Spark’s group stops in a castle town. After members of the team have an important discussion, the group hears word of the dark elves and sets out once more.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Départ pour le front... À la poursuite d`une ombre
Sallying Forth... Pursuing a Dark Shadow
出陣... 黒い影を追って
